an4.87:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sekho hoti patipado;
an4.87:2.4: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ranno khattiyassa muddhavasittassa jettho putto abhiseko anabhisitto macalappatto;
an4.87:2.5: evamevam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sekho hoti patipado, anuttaram yogakkhemam patthayamano viharati.
an4.87:2.6: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo samanamacalo hoti.
an4.87:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati, no ca kho attha vimokkhe kayena phusitva viharati.
an4.87:3.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo samanapundariko hoti.
an4.87:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati, attha ca vimokkhe kayena phusitva viharati.
an4.87:4.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo samanapadumo hoti.
an4.87:5.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo samanesu samanasukhumalo hoti?
an4.87:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yacitova bahulam civaram paribhunjati, appam ayacito; yacitova bahulam pindapatam paribhunjati, appam ayacito; yacitova bahulam senasanam paribhunjati, appam ayacito; yacitova bahulam gilanappaccayabhesajjaparikkharam paribhunjati, appam ayacito.
an4.87:5.3: Yehi kho pana sabrahmacarihi saddhim viharati, tyassa manapeneva bahulam kayakammena samudacaranti, appam amanapena; manapeneva bahulam vacikammena samudacaranti, appam amanapena; manapeneva bahulam manokammena samudacaranti, appam amanapena;
an4.87:5.4: manapamyeva bahulam upaharam upaharanti, appam amanapam.
an4.87:5.5: Yani kho pana tani vedayitani pittasamutthanani va semhasamutthanani va vatasamutthanani va sannipatikani va utuparinamajani va visamapariharajani va opakkamikani va kammavipakajani va, tani panassa na bahudeva uppajjanti. Appabadho hoti.
an4.87:5.6: Catunnam jhananam abhicetasikanam ditthadhammasukhaviharanam nikamalabhi hoti akicchalabhi akasiralabhi,
an4.87:5.7: asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati.
an4.87:5.8: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo samanesu samanasukhumalo hoti.
an4.87:6.1: Yanhi tam, bhikkhave, samma vadamano vadeyya samanesu samanasukhumaloti, mameva tam, bhikkhave, samma vadamano vadeyya samanesu samanasukhumaloti.
an4.87:6.2: Ahanhi, bhikkhave, yacitova bahulam civaram paribhunjami, appam ayacito; yacitova bahulam pindapatam paribhunjami, appam ayacito; yacitova bahulam senasanam paribhunjami, appam ayacito; yacitova bahulam gilanappaccayabhesajjaparikkharam paribhunjami, appam ayacito.
an4.87:6.3: Yehi kho pana bhikkhuhi saddhim viharami te me manapeneva bahulam kayakammena samudacaranti, appam amanapena; manapeneva bahulam vacikammena samudacaranti, appam amanapena; manapeneva bahulam manokammena samudacaranti, appam amanapena; manapamyeva bahulam upaharam upaharanti, appam amanapam.
an4.87:6.4: Yani kho pana tani vedayitani pittasamutthanani va semhasamutthanani va vatasamutthanani va sannipatikani va utuparinamajani va visamapariharajani va opakkamikani va kammavipakajani va, tani me na bahudeva uppajjanti. Appabadhohamasmi.
an4.87:6.5: Catunnam kho panasmi jhananam abhicetasikanam ditthadhammasukhaviharanam nikamalabhi akicchalabhi akasiralabhi,
an4.87:6.6: asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharami.
an4.87:7.1: Yanhi tam, bhikkhave, samma vadamano vadeyya samanesu samanasukhumaloti, mameva tam, bhikkhave, samma vadamano vadeyya samanesu samanasukhumaloti.
an4.87:7.2: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmin”ti.
